text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- President Ben Ali on Tuesday announced several measures aimed at helping youths prepare for the future. Among the measures, the next development plan (1997-2001) will include a special chapter on youths.
- French Environment Minister Corinne Lepage on Tuesday ended a visit to Tunisia during which she held talks with Tunisian officials on opportunities for cooperation.
